name: SelectManager
description: SelectManager stores the selected, who, and playerid properties from the last user-generated message (as opposed to API generated), and makes them available for another script to retrieve. This solves the problem of an API-generated message not having the original array of selected tokens, for instance. For more information, see the original thread in the API forum:https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/9503075/script-selectmanager-utility-to-preserve-the-selected-tokens-for-api-generated-calls-coding-best-practice
